nodes.text: The Scoundrel Personality Chip S-01 was a personality matrix that could be installed on a droid to change their voice and personality. Mubo's Droid Depot on Batuu sold these chips.
The Scoundrel Personality Chip S-01 was one of several personality chips introduced in The Sims 4 Star Wars: Journey to Batuu and available for purchase by players on Batuu.
